casebody.data:
Virginia BUKOVAC, Respondent,
v.
KANSAS CITY LIVE, LLC, Appellant. WD 80503 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: March 13, 2018 John E. Turner, Christopher P. Sweeny, and Marty W. Seaton, Kansas City, MO, Attorneys for Respondent. Michelle R. Stewart, Overland Park, KS, Attorney for Appellant. Before Division IV: Mark D. Pfeiffer, Chief Judge, and Cynthia L. Martin and Gary D. Witt, Judges

Order

Per Curiam:

Kansas City Live, LLC appeals from the judgment of the Circuit Court of Jackson County, Missouri, awarding Ms. Virginia Bukovac damages for personal injuries she sustained as a result of a fall she sustained due to a defect in the condition of a sidewalk. Because a published opinion would have no precedential value, a memorandum of law has been provided to the parties. The judgment is affirmed. Rule 84.16(b).
